Name: Dry Ice Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Icewine has fabulously rich concentrated flavours due to being made using grapes frozen on the vine in Canada's harsh and early winters. Thanks to icewine, despite the name, this Martini is slightly honeyed rather than being bone dry.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly in London, England. Martini cocktail and its evolution
Nutrition: One serving of Dry Ice Martini contains 214 calories
